name: play-youtube
objective: use google chrome to play youtube video
description: Check if google chrome is able to display youtube videos
pre_condition: Have a google account and have Google chrome started with the main "applications" page displayed

steps.description: In the google applications page, click on "YouTube"
steps.expected: The "YouTube" page appears

steps.description: In the YouTube search field, type "chrome"

steps.expected: A listing of video appears
The video starts correctly (video and sound synchronized)
The video stops
The video restarts
The video is played in mute mode

steps.description: Click anywhere on the video progress bar
steps.expected: The video continues to be displayed correctly from selected part
The video is correctly displayed in Full screen mode
The video stops
The video restarts
The video is played in mute mode

steps.description: Click anywhere on the video progress bar
steps.expected: The video continues to be displayed correctly from selected part

author: elebideau

name: play-video-ogg
objective: use google chrome to play ogg theora videos
description: Check if Google chrome is able to display ogg theora videos
pre_condition: have Google chrome started and have a ogg theora video file in your home directory

steps.description: In the search bar, type "~" and press "Enter"
steps.expected: Your home directory appears in chrome

steps.description: Click on the ogg theora file
steps.expected: Chrome starts correctly the video
The video is correctly displayed in Full screen mode
The video stops
The video restarts
The video is played in mute mode

steps.description: Click anywhere on the video progress bar
steps.expected: The video continues to be displayed correctly from selected part

author: elebideau

steps.expected: The video continues to be displayed correctly from selected part

name: play-audio-ogg

description: Check if Google chrome is able to play ogg audio files
pre_condition: have Google chrome started and have a ogg audio file in your home directory

steps.description: In the search bar, type "~" and press "Enter"
steps.expected: Your home directory appears in chrome

steps.description: Click on the ogg audio file
steps.expected: Chrome starts correctly the audio file
The audio file stops
The audio file restarts
The audio is in mute mode

steps.description: Click anywhere on the audio progress bar
steps.expected: The audio file continues to play correctly from selected part

name: play-presentation-fullscreen
objective: use google chrome to play presentation in fullscreen mode
description: Check if chrome handles the full screen presentation
pre_condition: have Google Drive started in Chrome and have imported a ppt presentation file in google drive

steps.description: Right-click on the ppt file listed in Goodgle Drive
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens
A drop-right menu opens
The Google presentation application loads and starts correctly in a new tab

steps.description: On the top-right window, click on Play
steps.expected: The presentation starts in full screen mode

steps.description: Click on "Allow" on the full screen notifications which appears on the top screen
Use the mouse-clicking or the Up and Down or Left and Right keys to switch between the slides
Move the mouse to display a tool panel and select "Quit" on it
steps.expected: The Full screen mode has end correctly

author: elebideau
